<p>Presents ongoing research to develop a large-scale terrain renderer for tje Unity game engine</p>
<ul class="list-disc">
<li>Presents a novel adaptive tessellation scheme that's run entirely on the GPU</li>
<li>Utilizes a recursive subdivision scheme known as &quot;Longest Edge Bisection&quot; that divides a triangle along its longest edge and effectively forms a binary tree</li>
<li>Does not utilize tessellation shader stages, only uses compute and vertex shaders</li>
<li>Discusses the integration into Unity</li>
</ul>
